AddSheet.description:
DCOLUMNSHEET [Client] Adds a new column/tab.

[string] name
  Name of the column/tab

[Panel] pnl
  Panel to be used as contents of the tab. This normally would be a DPanel

[string] icon=nil
  Icon for the tab. This will ideally be a silkicon, but any material name can be used.

SetActiveButton.description:
DCOLUMNSHEET [Client] 

[Panel] active
  The button to make active button
